name: Cake Gluttony
description: Hello everyone! My name is Andrew and this is my very first game jam submission, which I did all with my friend Brandon. We worked hard during these 10 days to get the best possible game idea that fit the theme criteria. In Cake Gluttony, you are a hungry child, who is also afraid of the pantry in the kitchen. Collect food by fighting enemies and go to the sink and press "E" in order to prepare the food. The food will grant you health based on which enemy it is. Level up as best as you can but only go in the pantry at your own risk...
